name: Monolithic Chirstmas Night
description:
The end is near, a gang of 12 crooks are out to get you. Will you survive the nights to come or perish in the end?

A sort of I.RULE deal, where the game is a fangame of two things in different aspects
Mechanically a FNAF-Fangame, but everything else is a fangame of something else... in this case, Monolith! [The one where you play as ships in a facility to be specific]

Featuring users from the Monolith discord server as the cast, this game boasts 5 full nights with Cutscenes and Bullet-Hell styled Boss Fights inbetween! Plus the obligatory Custom Night mode and other gamemodes.

Unlike most FNAF-Style games, you aren't gonna be waiting your nights out. You'll have to complete them via typing on your Writing Module enough times. The further you get into the nights, the more you'll have to type in to move on.

...Just don't get caught in the midst of it.


Controls - Either Mouse or Keyboard.
[Mouse]
Left Click - Pretty much everything.
[Keyboard]
T - Left Door  /   Y - Right Door
G - Writing Module  /   H - Cameras
Space - Quick Exit out of either modules
Esc - Return to Main Menu

Check out Monolith if you haven't done so yet! It deserves more attention.
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/603960/Monolith/
Itch.io Demo Page: https://team-d-13.itch.io/monolithdemo
